item.title: Pavement Coffeehouse
item.description: Pavement Coffeehouse Info 44 Gainsborough St, Boston MA 02115 Hours: Generally speaking 7-7, with some varience for holiday and summer hours https://pavementcoffeehouse.com/ Review I live literally around the block from the Symphony Pavement location and am not a big fan of cooking weekend mornings, so I’ve been to Pavement an unfortunate number of times. It really does have a lot to recommend it - the coffee (and other drinks, like the matcha latte) are good, if expensive.
